component.name: HomeScene
component.script: Sub Init() m.Poster = m.top.findNode("SafeZone") m.Poster.width = m.global.Width m.Poster.height = m.global.Height if m.Poster.height = 1080 m.Poster.uri = "https://roku.app.box.com/representation/file_version_81845259633/image_2048/1.png?shared_name=m2w2dbk40irc49mlyghpfnrcmt9bvcjl" else m.Poster.uri = "https://roku.app.box.com/representation/file_version_81845261473/image_2048/1.png?shared_name=ibdmi5h3k05yhrxmjbth4o1lilory5hz" end if End Sub
